segments.text: Honey , the house is such a mess ! I need you to help me tidy up a bit . My boss and her husband are coming over for dinner and the house needs to be spotless !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m in the middle of something right now . I ’ ll be there in a second .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This can ’ t wait ! I need your help now !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , here ’ s a list of chores we need to get done . I'll do the dishes and get all the groceries for tonight.You can sweep and mop the floors . Oh , and the furniture needs to be dusted .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know what , I have to pick something up at the mall , so why don ’ t you clean the floors and I'll go to the supermarket and get all the groceries .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure that ’ s fine . Here is the list of all the things you need to get . Don't forget anything ! And can you pick up a bottle of wine on your way home ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hey , honey I ’ m back . Wow , the house looks really good !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great ! Can you set the table ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just a sec I ’ m just gonna vacuum this rug real fast .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wait ! Don ’ t turn it on ...
segments.speaker: S1
